title: Omicron Pushes Health Authorities Toward Learning to Live With Covid-19
sub_head: Nations abandon restrictive steps to contain the virus even as cases of the relatively mild variant surge
body:
The Omicron variant spreads so quickly and generally causes such a mild form of illness among vaccinated populations that countries are tolerating greater Covid-19 outbreaks, willingly letting infections balloon to levels that not long ago would have constituted public-health crises.
From different starting points, authorities in North America, Europe and the Asia-Pacific are moving in the same direction, offering a glimpse into a future in which the pandemic crisis becomes a fact of everyday life, like seasonal flu.
